typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	trm as double (1000.00)
}
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		Escenario as string,
		CuentaAuxiliar as string,
		CuentaObjeto as string,
		Anio as string,
		Mes as string,
		Libro as string,
		CentroResponsabilidad as string,
		CodigoEmpresa as string,
		CodigoCompania as string,
		ValorOrigen as double,
		ValorOrigenSensibilidad as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQL
SqlServer alterRow(updateIf(true()),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow3 alterRow() ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow4 alterRow() ~> AlterRow3
SQL alterRow() ~> AlterRow4
